      Open Source Projects

      • 2024
        otorecon
        • Bug Bounty Recon Tool
      • 2024
        bff-subdomains
        • This Python script is a subdomain bruteforcer tool.
      • 2024
        parameth
        • This Python script is a simple tool to find GET and POST parameters.
      • 2024
        dnmasscan
        • A script that can resolve an input file of domains and scan them with masscan.
      • 2024
        EndPoint-Finder
        • Finds the End-Points in JavaScript files.
      • 2024
        webarchive.py
        • This Python script is used to extract URLs from the https://web.archive.org.
      • 2024
        commoncrawl.py
        • This Python script is a multi-threaded tool for retrieving data from the CommonCrawl index. It allows you to specify a domain or a list of domains, and it will retrieve all URLs associated with those domains that are indexed by CommonCrawl.
      • 2024
        urlcrawler.py
        • urlcrawler.py is a Python script that performs a web crawl for a spesific domain or domains list. This script finds all URLs under the domains.
      • 2024
        crtsh.py
        • This Python script is a simple tool to find subdomains using the https://crt.sh.
      • 2023
        mr0wido.github.io
        • My Personal Website
      • 2023
        xss-cookie-stealer-python-script
        • Reformed Cookie Stealer Python Script
